It was a strong adhesion too, not unlike glue, and when Avery lifted her foot a second later, you went with it.

Finally, you spotted what appeared to be a rather large speedboat piloted by two wild sorority girls. It was racing up along the shore, bouncing along the waves and splashing water in its wake.
